    IQI REALTY SDN. BHD. (YC) Vacancies Real Estate Negotiator - 房地产销售 - Full Time

    November 14, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    IQI REALTY SDN. BHD. (YC) is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Real Estate Negotiator - 房地产销售 - Full Time position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    WHO SUITABLE FOR THIS JOB? PEOPLE WHO...
    • Wish to have higher income
    • Bored by 9 to 5 job, seeking new challenges
    • Wanted to start own building business
    • Have a strong desire for success
    • Wish to arrange a job schedule at own pace
    JOB SCOPE
    • Online Marketing on Facebook
    • Calling for appointment
    • House viewing with client
    • Assist client thru loan process
    JOB REQUIREMENT
    • Have own transport
    • No experience required
    • Fresh Graduate are welcome
    INCOME LEVEL (Commission Based)
    • Beginner Agent   → RM5,000 - RM8,000 and above
    • Mature Agent      → RM10,000 - RM12,000 and above
    • Leader                → RM12,000 and above
    • Head of Team     → At least RM20,000
    RESOURCES
    • Over 150+ Projects
    • Exclusive Projects from branded developer
    • 5 Days Full Comission Scheme
    • Unlimited training provided
    • Leads & Roadshow support
    • Global 14 Cities & Malaysia 8 Branches
    INCENTIVES
    • Overseas Incentive Trips (12 destination per year)
    • Dream Car Challenge (Free Down-payment & Installment)
    • Rolex Challenge
    • Dream House Challenge (Up to 50% discount for agent)
    ▌ SIX REASON - WHY IQI ？
          1. INTERNATIONAL PLATFORM
    We are in global different 15 cities, including SINGAPORE, AUSTRALIA, ENGLAND, CHINA, THAILAND, VIETNAM, CAMBODIA, CANADA, DUBAI, FILLIPHINES
          2. SWIFT COMMISSION
    In IQI, we pay agent after 5 working days, instead of 3 - 6 months in market practices
     
          3. EMPOWERMENT IN EDUCATION
    Knowledge is the key to success, in IQI we provide all kinds of OFFLINE and ONLINE training, with own Online Academy
          4. ATTRACTIVE INCENTIVES
    Other than commissions, we provide all kinds of incentives, including Dream Car, Dream House, Trips, Fine Dining and more!
          5. INDUSTRY LEADING COMPANY
    We are the biggest Real Estate Agency in Malaysia, with over 16,000 agents up to date
     
          6. PIONEER INNOVATOR
    In IQI, we are ahead of the market. We have own apps, own green screen studio, online academy and more. Including China most popular overseas property portal - JUWAI

    Company Overview

    IQI is a leading global real estate & investment advisory firm operating and advising in Dubai, Malaysia, Australia, Canada, Philippines, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore and still expanding rapidly with over 16,000 agents in line.

    In IQI, our agents are constantly groomed and monitored to ensure they keep up with the industry's demands. "We Enjoy Life" while working hard to achieve our dreams, and we seek to reward our warriors as they strive harder to accomplish new milestones and improve results.

    Malaysia Branches:
    • KUALA LUMPUR
    • JОHOR
    • PENANG
    • MELACCA
    • IPOH
    • KOTA KINABALU
    • KUANTAN
    • KUCHING
    • SIBU
    • MIRI
    • KELANTAN
    • SEREMBAN

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
    Apply Online
